feed.title: Google Cloud: Agent Assist
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Agent Assist

entry.content: Google Cloud provides **quotas** for using Agent Assist APIs. Each feature uses specific APIs, which have their own [quotas](https://cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/quotas).
entry.summary: This is a longer summary about quotas for Agent Assist APIs, which are specific to each feature and have their own limits.
entry.title: Changed: Agent Assist API Quotas

entry.content: Agent Assist offers **Summarization with custom sections V4.0** in GA. [V4.0](https://cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/summarization-with-custom-sections) uses gemini-2.0-flash and supports a concise summary for situation and action.
entry.summary: Agent Assist now offers summarization with custom sections V4.0 in General Availability. This latest version utilizes gemini-2.0-flash for concise summaries, focusing on situation and action.
entry.title: Feature: Agent Assist Summarization V4.0 Now Available
